forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. North northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Isolated Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 91, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 3 to 7 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 2am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. North northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
